      • centerIn

        public java.awt.Point centerIn(java.awt.Component c,
                      int y)
        Centers the calling component inside container c, at the height y. Does not take c's X coords into account, as its assumed the calling component is added to the container c.
        Parameters:
        c - Component to center to in the x direction.
        y - Height to be placed at.
        Returns:

      • centerOn

        public java.awt.Point centerOn(java.awt.Component c,
                      int y)
        Centers calling component to the horizontal center of component c.
        Parameters:
        c - Component to center on horizontally
        y - The Y position to be placed at.
        Returns:

      • centerOn

        Centers calling component to the vertical center of component c.
        Parameters:
        x - The X position to be placed at.
        c - Component to center on vertically.
        Returns:
